item.title: CyberWorld 2021年路线图
item.description: 官方博客：https://blog.cybermiles.io/categories/zh/ 微博：CyberMiles中文社区 小助手微信：C

item.title: Roadmap 2021 for CyberMiles NFT Platform CyberWorld
item.description: CyberMiles NFT Platform, CyberWorld, has been officially launched together with Sino Globalin May 2021 ahead of schedule. CyberWorld Version 0.5 attracted great attention from over 120, 000 users in the community. CyberWorld Version 1.0 is launched. CyberWorld Genesis NFTs were minted and released along with the launch. A powerful token distribution software was developed to automatically send any crypto tokens to massive number of addresses. CyberWorld Version 2.0 is under development right now.
